income_messages:
From: e****y@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-20 19:41:14
SUBJECT: Mrs. Editht Edwards 42 Chandos
Mrs. Editht Edwards 42 Chandos Crescent, Edgware HA8 6HL Middlesex,
United Kingdom    Attention :  DONATION OF £20 MILLION   I am the
above named person but now undergoing medical treatment in London,
England. I am married to Dr. Richards Edwards who worked in England
for over a decade before he died on 5th of July in the year 2012.  We
were married for fifteen years without a child. He died after a brief
illness that lasted for two weeks. Before his death he made a vow to
use his wealth for the down trodden and the less privileged in the
society.  Since his death I decided not to re-marry or get a child
outside my matrimonial home. When my late husband was alive he
deposited the sum of £20 Million with one Finance House. Presently,
this money is still with the Finance House.  Recently, my Doctor told
me that I would not last for the next few days or months due to cancer
problem. Though what disturbs me most is my stroke.  I want an
individual that will use this to fund and provide succor to poor and
indigent persons, orphanages, and widows and for propagating peace in
the universe.   Any delay in your reply will give me room in sourcing
for an individual for this same purpose. Please assure me that you
will act according to specification herein. Hoping to hear from you.
Thank you and May the Almighty God bless you.  Yours sincerely, Mrs.
Edith Edwards (Benefactor
From: e****y@yahoo.com
To: w*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 02:28:39
SUBJECT: Re[2]: Mrs. Editht Edwards 42 Chandos
Dearest 
Many thanks for your mail.
However, i must not fail to commend your Courage and willingness to help secure this fund Anyway, I do not have much to say rather my first mail to you must have explained everything. Like i explained in my mail to you that am presently sick and needs a God fearing person that can help in securing the deposited fund at Bank here. The reason for such help is that, My present condition is critical and i can not help going through the process of securing all the necessary document that might be required by the Bank before it is release. More so, the Doctor has made it known to me that i have just few days to live. It was for the reason that i needed someone that will claim this funds and use it to better the lives of the poor and needy in the society.Though 28% should be for your help and you will use the remaining 72% to assist me to fulfill my last wish on earth.
Upon your interest to help claim this fund, i shall furnish you with the Deposit Certificate at the time it was deposited.
On your willingness to help, I Shall appreciate you furnish me with the following information,
Address
Telephone
Age
Please I need all this in order to know if one is capable to handle such transaction.Because, i would not want someone that will claim the fund and go away with fund without fulfilling my Dream.
I hope to reading through your Mail. My present location is india where am taking treatment
May God Bless you.
Yours sincerely,
Mrs. Edith Edwards
Monday, 20 February 2023, 10:36 -0600 from Howard  <wk99174@mail.wltechinc.top>:
outbound_messages:
From: w*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
To: e****y@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-02-20 19:41:16
SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Editht Edwards 42 Chandos
I am really sorry to hear that and I think I can help with this situation.
Please just tell me what I can do for you.
Best,
Howard
From: w*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
To: e****y@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-02-21 02:41:13
SUBJECT: Re: Re[2]: Mrs. Editht Edwards 42 Chandos
I have read what you wrote and I just want to be sure the risks.
Best,
Howard
